legal_basis: Rule 355(2) of the Federal Court Rules
procedure_followed: Court found Musadiq Pardhan guilty of contempt, assessed penalties, and determined costs based on evidence and legal precedents.
decision_reasoning: reflecting the maximum allowable fine under the applicable rules and mitigating factors such as the dismissal of the original injunction.
result_of_case: Musadiq Pardhan fined $4,000; Mustafa Pardhan not guilty; costs awarded at $80,000 against Musadiq Pardhan and $15,000 against Mustafa Pardhan.
